title: Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Sun Coming over Clouds above Ocean", 1885–90
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Choppy ocean in foreground. In sky, large cloud front with sun rising (or setting) behind it, half concealed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Sun Coming over Clouds above Ocean", 1885–90.
1885–90. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-84-70.
